features: A compact, plug-and-stay, high-speed USB 3.1 flash drive that’s ideal for adding more storage to laptops, game consoles, in-car audio and more
Simple, fast way to add up to 512GB of storage to your device [1GB=1,000,000,000 bytes - Actual user storage less]

Read speeds up to 130MB/s(1) [(1) Write to drive up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (4MB/s); USB 3.1 Gen 1 or USB 3.0 port required. Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending on host device; 1MB=1,000,000 bytes]
Write up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives(1)

Move a full-length movie to the drive in less than 30 seconds(2) [(2) Based on 1.2GB MPEG-4 video transfer with USB 3.1 Gen 1 or USB 3.0 host device; Results may vary based on host device, file attributes and other factors]

Keep private files private with included SanDisk SecureAccess software(3) [(3) Password protection uses 128-bit AES encryption and is supported by Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and macOS v10.9 plus (Software download required for Mac, visit the official SanDisk website for SecureAccess details)]
Five-year limited manufacturer warranty [Visit the official SanDisk website for warranty details]
body.description: The simple way to add extra, high-speed storage to your device! The SanDisk Ultra Fit USB 3.1 Flash Drive delivers performance that allows you to move a full-length movie up to 15x faster than with standard USB 2.0 drives.(1) Plus, thanks to its compact, streamlined design, you can plug it in and leave it in. | *1GB=1,000,000,000 bytes. Actual user storage less | (1)Write to drive up to 15X faster than standard USB 2.0 drives (4MB/s); up to 130MB/s read speed. USB 3.1 Gen 1 or USB 3.0 port required. Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending on host device. 1MB=1,000,000 bytes | (2)Based on 1.2GB MPEG-4 video transfer with USB 3.1 Gen 1 or USB 3.0 host device. Results may vary based on host device, file attributes and other factors. | (3)Password protection uses 128-bit AES encryption and is supported by Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and macOS v10.9+ (Software download required for Mac, visit the official SanDisk website for SecureAccess details) | (4)Registration required; terms and conditions apply..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High-speed USB 3.1 Performance With write speeds up to 15x faster than standard USB 2.0 drives,(1) you can move a full-length movie to the drive in less than 30 seconds(2).

Compact Plug-and Stay Design Designed for plug-and-stay storage, this compact flash drive works with laptops, tablets, TVs, gaming consoles, car audio systems, and more. Plug it in, and you’ve got instant storage that’s always available!
Compatible with USB 3.0 and 2.0 Ports The SanDisk Ultra Fit USB 3.1 Flash Drive is backwards compatible, so you can plug it into any USB 3.0 or 2.0 port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best thumb drives for temp storage!
reviews.reviewText: This is for the 256GB with 130mb speeds only!Worked right out of the packaging. (I own 3 of these) They all work great but have their pros and cons.Pros: Cheap. Memory is accurate. Affordable. Plug and play.Cons: Gets a tad warm if used too long but considering I have ran it for 8 hour straight recording gameplay it still manages to stay in one piece. Slow read and write. Some files take longer however I have found if trying to write multiple files to the drive it tends to get laggy and can take quite awhile longer so I suggest a file at a time.Easy to lose as its about the size of a penny. I have made my own lanyards for this particular item out of old electronic cord and have never lost them. Suggest doing the same.Overall I am pleased with this external drive and has yet to let me down. Note: I use this nearly everyday and have never had any issues and this applies to all three I own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small with big storage
reviews.reviewText: The SanDisk 256GB Ultra Fit USB 3.1 is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a compact and high-capacity USB drive. I have been using this drive for several months now, and I am very impressed with its performance and reliability.One of the things that I really like about this drive is its size. It is incredibly small and compact, which makes it very easy to carry around with me wherever I go. Despite its small size, it has an impressive capacity of 256GB, which is more than enough for my needs.The drive also has a USB 3.1 interface, which provides fast transfer speeds. I have been able to transfer large files such as videos and photos in just a matter of seconds, which is very convenient.In terms of build quality, the SanDisk 256GB Ultra Fit USB 3.1 feels very sturdy and well-made. The drive has a metal casing that gives it a premium look and feel. I have accidentally dropped the drive a few times, but it has held up very well and has not suffered any damage.Another great feature of this drive is its compatibility with a wide range of devices. I have used it with my laptop, desktop, and even my smart TV, and it has worked perfectly with all of them.Overall, I am very happy with my purchase of the SanDisk 256GB Ultra Fit USB 3.1. It is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-capacity, reliable, and compact USB drive. I would highly recommend this drive to anyone in the market for a new USB drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: This SanDisk USB storage drive is amazing. FIrst it is so small and portable, yet durable.This review is for the 256GB version and the speed is relatively fast for transferring files.We ordered 2 of them for additional backup and couldn't be happier with the purchase.For the price and brand name it would be difficult to find a better alternative than this drive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and capacity for value
reviews.reviewText: Use these in multiple vehicles for music files. Depending on vehicle, playback is seamless, quality is high, and ability to navigate through folders and such is on par. The only reason for 4 stars is because one was not readable right out of the package. Computer would not recognize it. Even tried DOS (command) prompt to manipulate to no avail. Computer used is two weeks old, and tried on multiple computers. Other than the one, these are great tiny drives if your looking for something with a minimal footprint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good transfer and added storage device
reviews.reviewText: Working well, quick transfers and barely takes up any space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the USB in February 2019 and it failed in Nov 2019, ten months hmmm. From new it required far more pressure to insert then my other USB drives and the housing became noticeably warm when in use. At that point, I should have sent it back but instead dismissed it as the consequence of its small architecture and poor manufacturing tolerances. After less than fifty applications the housing broke but more annoying the stored data became unrecoverable. I have several full size SanDisk and other maker USB drives and none have exhibited the above noted concerns or failures. Unfortunately four days ago my wife purchased the SanDisk 256 model and it also requires more insertion force than should be required, foreshadowing dear reader. Would I recommend this product? Absolutely not. Will I continue future Sandisk purchases? Probably, but not their miniature series. SanDisk, if you wish to offer me recompense, I will gladly include your response as an appendix to my review.Cheers EUpdate: Nov 25, 2019The day after submitting my Amazon review I contacted the SanDisk warranty department by email requesting recompense as the USB was less than 5 years old. I provided them a copy of my Amazon purchase order and the next day I received a follow-up email from SanDisk® Global Customer Care stating SanDisk did not have a 128gb replacement in stock (in the warehouse) but would I settle for two 64gb instead to which I replied, yes. Within a day or two I received another SanDisk email this time different in tone. It referenced my Amazon.com review and included the following highlighted in blue, "Note: Refurbished, physically damaged or non-authentic products are not covered by SanDisk warranty". The email also included an RMA (Return to Merchant Authorization) but no mention of the previous replacement offer.So what happened, a SanDisk employee armed with my Amazon purchase receipt trolled the Amazon.com website and located my review. Upon reading it they identified I had mentioned the USB casing had broken and presto SanDisk feels the warranty claim is disqualified, hence the blue highlighted script. To appear as a good corporate citizen they now offer me an RMA (Return to Manufacturer Authorization) so we can go through the process. Okay I will, with the clear understanding that I intend publish every SanDisk response regardless of the outcome.Other critical Amazon reviews about this product identify similar concerns, it runs hotter than a full sized USB, it is a tight fit especially in USB 3.0 ports, the housing cracks and this device prematurely ends in software/hardware failure. See a similar Amazon.com posted review provided by Gennaro M. on March 15, 2018. It is one of the many provided by dissatisfied consumers. My complaint, like those generated before me, does not originate from consumer misuse, abuse or accident but by product failure and warranty issues.Stay tuned for SanDisks response which I intend to publish when I receive it.Cheers EOn 2019.11.27, I received the following email from James P.. a SanDisk® Global Customer Care rep, "Thank you for writing back to us. Please be informed that the statement which was sent in the e-mail is a standard statement which we use in all automated RMA approval e-mail for letting customers know that Refurbished, physically damaged or non-authentic products are not covered by SanDisk warranty. Also we understand that you are not very satisfied with the model of flash drive which you were using earlier i.e. SanDisk® Ultra Fit USB 3.1. Therefore we would like to offer you an alternative product i.e. SanDisk® Cruzer Glide USB 3.0 128GB (SDCZ600-128G) in replacement. Please suggest if you are agreed for the alternative model".I agreed to accept their offer and on 2019.12.10 I received without cost to me a full size USB SanDisk® Cruzer Glide USB 3.0 128GB (SDCZ600-128G) delivered to my door. In the end SanDisk® or the parent company Western Digital Technologies Inc honored the warranty. I will continue to use SanDisk® as long as the honor they warranty. However I would not again purchase or recommend this specific product the SanDisk® Ultra Fit USB 3.1.cheers e.

reviews.reviewTitle: Prático e fácil de transportar além da capacidade ser boa, pois para ser melhor teria que ser 2TB.
reviews.reviewText: Até o momento não tenho nada contra, funciona perfeitamente, só que essa invenção de USB 3.2 só um chamariz, meu PC é da DELL e 2 canecões frontais de 3.0 e os equipamentos acima de 2.0 funcionam com uma mínima velocidade acima, o que deveria ser ao menos 50% a mais, principalmente com essa capacidade e não é problema do pen-drive, pode até se do próprio PC. Para finalizar digo que estou satisfeito com o produto, não tanto com esperava mas valeu a pena a capacidade e a segurança dos dados.

Excelente PenDrive! É o segundo deste modelo que adquiro, pois sei que é um produto de qualidade! Tenho outros da Kingston também, mas em termos de velocidade e durabilidade esse é melhor!Um eu utilizo no meu NES mini para colocar mais jogos via armazenamento USB e funciona perfeitamente, sem engasgos ou demoras em carregar, já com o Kingston, quando funciona, dá umas engasgadas bravas!A velocidade não é das melhores, mas para as minhas necessidades me atendem muito bem. O seu tamanho minúsculo pode ser um problema para pessoas descuidadas e perdê-lo facilmente, então atenção!Produto muito bom, original, de qualidade e me atendeu muito bem! Recomendo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Super small. Connected 24/7 and it is not overheating.
reviews.reviewText: Super small. I have it connected to my laptop all the time, with store some portable apps and for continuous backup of docs/files from specific folders on my machine. It works well. Fast. Simple. And although it is warm, it is not overheating / nor burning hot, even though it's hooked up virtually all the time, and that machine is running 24/7. The only negative -although not applicable in my personal use case - is that it is not overly fast when moving large files. All in all, great price for capacity.
minuscule clé USB mais diablement efficace grâce à sa rapidité et sa fiabilité. Je recommande.
